name: Vikingard
description:
Farm, fight and prosper like a true Viking!
Show your leadership to achieve crowning glory! Reclaim land, grow crops, preside over trials, and brawl with warriors in real Viking style! With fully developed characters, gripping storylines, and dynamic gameplays that are simultaneously exciting and casual, VIKINGARD is a game no true Norseman should miss！

Get prepared for your incredible Viking voyage!

【Game Features】
-Collect hersirs and make them your pride on the battlefield!
Valiant Viking warriors, heroic Valkyries... hundreds of high-quality animated heroes are at your command! With level, aptitude, weapon and other stats available for upgrade, devote your resources to your favorite hersirs and make them top the leaderboards!
-Go on voyages and explore the vast world!
From Scandinavia, venture deep into continental Europe and pen your epic! An incredible adventure awaits! Deal carefully with different issues on your journey as your choices have consequences.
-Join alliance and challenge yourself in strategic Alliance Clash!
Ice or Fire? Choose your faith! Join or create an alliance in the name of the Nordic gods. Contribute to the growth of the alliance, arrange allies and troops to challenge enemies in furious Clash, and finally lead your alliance to victory and glory!
-Create romantic stories and raise your heirs!
Travel around the world, meet various companions! Give them presents, go on dates, and unlock more romantic moments! Train your next generation and appoint hersirs to mentor them. Let them be your capable assistant on battlefield!
-Raise your pets to accompany aside in life and battles!
Play or train? How will you take care of your little pets? Let these fluffy friends be the strongest power to protect your tribe!
-Diverse gameplay and events make it possible to have a new experience every day!
Say no to tedious games! Have fun in the Mead Hall with players from all servers. Participate in Viking-featured mini games and meet fantastic new friends!
